items.name: logged-in
items.title: Logged In
items.description: A simple component that only renders its children if the user is logged in.

items.name: logged-out
items.title: Logged Out
items.description: A simple component that only renders its children if the user is logged out.

items.name: user-avatar
items.title: User Avatar
items.description: A simple component that displays the user's avatar.

items.name: auth-form
items.title: Auth Form
items.description: A simple auth form component that supports logging in, registering, resetting passwords, and two-factor auth.
